sn47.31:1.2: “‘Ayam kaye kayanupassana’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn47.31:1.3: ‘Sa kho panayam kaye kayanupassana bhavetabba’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
